channel.title: Ags-Rush Need Hoster, Server Side Programmer, Client Side Programmer and More
channel.description:
[color=green][size=24pt][font=impact][center][u][b][i]Welcome to Ags-Rush![/i][/b][/u][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Ags-Rush.jpg[/img][/center]
Features:
-Delta (Blank Client & Source)
-No GUI- Struggles with the GUI have occurred before, and we shouldn't have to worry about them.
-Old School Look, but not for long.
-Year Long Domain, for anyone who can code HTML, and support the server's website.
Intentions:
- A fun server for all to play.
-Adding All Spirit Shields, Correct Hitting Claws, 562 Interface.
-Remaking Server's like Hackscape, Near Reality (With More Added).
-Working Skills, including Decent Pk System, and Skilling.
-Staff/Help Needed.
-No Admins/ They only abuse. Unless, it's someone i know IRL/ or I trust a lot.
Staff/Help Needed:
- Server Sided Coders (1,2) They need to be the same, or different timezone as me, include some of their work, and their skype. [code] Server Sided Coder App: Name- Timezone- Some Work- Skype-[/code] -Client Sided Coders (0,2) They need to be the same, or different timezone as me, include some of their work, and their skype. [code]Name- Timezone- Some Work- Skype-[/code] -Host (0,2) Not much requirements, i just need you to list your computer details. [code] Computer Details- Skype-[/code] -Moderators (0,1) I need, detailed information on you, your skype, and your age. [code] Information on You- Skype- Age-[/code] -Web Page Designers (0,1) I need you to be able to not only code a decent looking website, but make a free forums for now, also the ability to upload a webclient. You will become the Web-Site Designer, and will have the ability to choose forum moderators with my consent. [code] Work- Skype- Age- [/code]
TOS- By applying to this thread, you agree that, you will do your best to help out the server, you will not steal the work, and you will not wrong me in anyway financially. If you do the following, you will be sued or lawful actions will be taken against you.
It's the same source cleaned and restarted. I keep running into errors.
Skills:
Finished:
Woodcutting Cooking Crafting - I'm putting this as finished, i only have gem crafting finished.
Working On:
Mining Fletching
Not Yet Finished:
Runecrafting Fishing Herblore Firemaking Farming Construction Agility Thieving Slayer Hunter Smithing Summoning - Still Deciding if I'm going to add.
Client Updates:
Finished:
Not Finished:
634 Sprites/Gameframe/Interfaces Korasi/Spirit Shields/Claws/Godswords More Models Like ^^ Curses Fixing Dupes Splash Screen
Miscellaneous to do:
Finished:
Working On: Website- 65%
Not Finished:
Media: [size=10pt][i][b][u]Woodcutting[/u][/b][/i][/size]: [IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Woodcutting.png[/img] [size=10pt][b][i][u]Crafting[/u][/i][/b][/size] [IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Crafting.png[/img] [size=10pt][u][i][b]Cooking[/b][/i][/u][/size] [IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Cooking.png[/img]
Credits: Randqm- For Cleaned ISkape Source and Client Ravens- Support and The Website Advocatus- Woodcutting Help/Support RuneWings317- Random Help/Support Mopar Tuts
If I forgot anyone, please leave a message and I will add your name.

If you want me to show you anything just ask and ill put something together real quick. Iâ€™m bored and looking for something to do on my spare time.
